mapper.select: select a.catalog_code as item_catalog_code ,a.attribute_type as item_attribute_type ,a.attribute_code as item_attribute_code ,a.attribute_data_type as item_attribute_data_type ,(select sd_desc from stx_dis_sd_code where sd_type = 'CATALOG_DATA_TYPE' and sd_code = a.attribute_data_type) as item_attribute_data_type_desc ,a.attribute_name as item_attribute_name ,a.attribute_required_flag as item_attribute_required_flag ,a.attribute_required_flag as item_attribute_rf_changed ,a.enable_flag as item_enable_flag ,a.assy_attribute_code as item_assy_attribute_code ,a.attribute_data_min as item_attribute_data_min ,a.attribute_data_max as item_attribute_data_max from stx_dis_sd_catalog_attribute a where a.attribute_type = 'ITEM' and a.catalog_code = #{catalog_code}
